item.title: Sinner vs. Alcaraz showdown at the US Open is their third Slam final in a row. Trump plans to attend
item.description: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz are the first two men to play each other in three consecutive Grand Slam finals in the same season

item.title: Hurricane Kiko's path shifts, sparing Hawaii from strong winds and heavy rain
item.description: National Weather Service says Hurricane Kiko is tracking north of the Hawaiian islands, reducing the threat of strong winds and widespread rain
